title: Edinburgh/Stockbridge and Canonmills
name: The Gramophone Emporium
alt: Purveyors of vintage Gramophones and 78rpm discs
hours: 2PM-5PM Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat 10:30AM-5PM, Sun 12:00noon-4PM, closed Mon & Tue
content: They sell original recordings of the greatest singers and instrumentalists from the late nineteenth and early years of the twentieth century. They stock an extensive range of rare classical, operatic & orchestral 78 rpm records. And gramophones of course.
